Posts.Content: Has anyone that has had a mastectomy find taking arneka helped or hindered their healing? I am having my op on 8th and I have been told arneka will help but im unsure and don't want to make matters worse by taking it. Any ideas?
Posts.Title: Arneka before mastectomy?

Posts.Content: Hi I have been sore since getting my biopsy, scans also seem to irritate my lumps (could be in my head), I too find wearing am sports bra 24 hrs a day helps when sleeping, although I am scared about my mastectomy I can't wait to not have pain anymore, hopefully :-) Good luck and i hope you get a better sleep :-)
Posts.Title: in agony
